name: Chez RAW
description:
Dinosaurs are hungry and you must feed them !

Fullfill the orders by harvesting food on the animals and combining them together. 

HOW TO PLAY :

Cursors keys -> control the T-Rex
SPACE : Attack
1, 2 , 3 : Change inventory slot
E : Place / Mix / Serve
F : Chop
G : Drop

 - Say no to animal cruelty.. unless you're a T-Rex.
